did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of Meetings of the Bricklayers, Masons, and Plasterers International Union of America 1912-1935

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Bricklayers, Masons, and Plasterers International Union of America. Local 2 (Douglas, Ariz.)

did.abstract: This collection includes holograph record book of minutes and accounts of monthly meetings of Local 2, Douglas, Ariz.

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Union local formed in 1912, Cochise County, Ariz.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph record book of minutes and accounts of monthly meetings of Local 2, Douglas, Ariz.
